programme.title: Gising Na Ang Higanteng Natutulog
programme.desc: Sgt. Delfin Guerrero (Andy Poe), an honest, kind-hearted and dedicated motorcycle cop who took on corrupt politicians in his mission to uphold the law.

programme.title: Paikot-ikot
programme.desc: To help combat street crime,the government forms a task force made up of narcotics agents and private detectives. Rocky and Gracia are the best investigators from the civilian group.

programme.title: Magic Kingdom: Ang Alamat Ng Damortis (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The daughter of the Empress Sophia,became the target of her uncle Basilicus’ murderous wrath after he killed the empress and crowned himself emperor.

programme.title: Mandurugas
programme.desc: Comedians Dennis Padilla and Janno Gibbs took on the spotlight in this film, which was their first screen team-up. The wacky duo played small-time con-men who, for a quick buck, would do anything or become anything.

programme.title: Minsan Pa (Kahit Konting Pagtingin 2) (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: The sequel to the first blockbuster team-up of FPJ and Sharon Cuneta in \"Kahit Konting Pagtingin\". This time around, their roles were reversed. Now that they had been given a second chance, they became determined to find out.

programme.title: Ang Mamatay Nang Dahil Sa Iyo
programme.desc: Anthony Alonzo characterizes a patriotic soldier whose amor patria runs curdling in his veins. His ideologies led him to a clash of opinions with his younger brother.

programme.title: Brown Ninja
programme.desc: Jun (Dante Varona) barely survives a massacre that wipes out his whole family. He was found by a blind, old man in the woods and is nursed back to health. The old man also teaches him the secrets of being a ninja. Jun makes use of his new skills to find his family's killers and bring them to justice.

programme.title: Isla Paraiso
programme.desc: A series of inexplicable and mind-boggling twists of incidents inside the hacienda take place as the animosity between two sisters heightens.

programme.title: Hindi Pahuhuli Ng Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: An assassination attempt by rebels on a police officer was foiled by ex-convict Robin.

programme.title: Diego
programme.desc: He is a member of an elite crop in the military. However,when his group decided to stage a coup against the government,he defied his head. What danger lurks in the jungle makes Diego a stark study of human fortitude and courage?

programme.title: Paano Ba Ang Mangarap? (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Lisa (Vilma Santos) and Benny (Jay Ilagan) have found their match in each other. Unfortunately, Benny dies before they get married.

programme.title: Lumaban Ka... Sagot Kita
programme.desc: Linette (Cherie Pie Picache) is an active student leader. She is frustrated that her boyfriend Dado (Julio Diaz) is apathetic towards the situation. But this will soon change.

programme.title: Papunta Ka Pa Lang, Pabalik Na Ako
programme.desc: Gaston, a veteran police officer does not want Jojo, a rookie police asset, for his daughter. Jojo proves himself and he finds a sidekick in Jojo.

programme.title: Takot Ako Sa Darling Ko
programme.desc: It was love at first sight between Joey de Leon and Jenny Syquia but there was a big problem. She belonged to a family of vampires who had reformed and were now on their way to becoming normal human beings.

programme.title: Hatulan: Bilibid Boys 2
programme.desc: Bilibid Boys are young and daring but lost in a cruel society.

programme.title: A E I O U
programme.desc: Five misbegotten but witty kids survived this cold-hearted community.They found their hero in the person of Captain Juan,a funny but dedicated cop.

programme.title: Epimaco Velasco Story, NBI
programme.desc: FPJ took on the role of the country's modern day hero, Epimaco Velasco. Presented here were some of the best known among the many celebrated cases he solved and his private life as a devoted family man.

programme.title: Kaputol Ng Isang Awit
programme.desc: An unfinished song became the key, which brought together a family forced apart by the obsessive love of a young woman for a famous singer.

programme.title: Boyong Mañalac, Hoodlum Terminator
programme.desc: After living a life full of vices, women and violence, Boyong Mañalac decided to turn his life around and mend his ways by taking after his father, an upright police officer. Boyong Mañalac personify the ideals of integrity and service to his countrymen.

programme.title: Buhay Mo'y Buhay Ko Rin
programme.desc: They're both members of the police force: he's an undercover assigned to crack a notorious syndicate, and she's a traffic officer tasked to manage the city's clogged streets.

programme.title: Hiram Na Mukha
programme.desc: Famous plastic surgeon Dr. Hugo (Christopher de Leon) worships the ground his fiancee Alicia (Nanette Medved) walks on. That is because he feels Alicia is his creation.

programme.title: Sumigaw Ka Hanggang Gusto Mo
programme.desc: Five murdered students, One terrified survivor, One mysterious killer on the loose.

programme.title: Kapag Iginuhit Ang Hatol Ng Puso
programme.desc: An intriguing drama about criss-crossed relationships. The people who were loving, using and losing each other.

programme.title: Pagbabalik Ni Kumander Lawin
programme.desc: Don Jaime (Robert Tlabis) is still bothered by his brother's death although the killer, Renato Solidum (Dante Varona), is currently languishing in prison. Only Renato's death will satisfy him.
